Meanwhile, a surprise encounter leads a cash-strapped Red toward a new business opportunity, and Tom takes action to investigate the bones in the suitcase.

value.name: Ilyas Surkov
value.overview: When Red provides exclusive intel on an international terrorist, it puts Liz and the Task Force on a collision course with a rival unit from the CIA. Meanwhile, Red and Hawkins lay the groundwork for their new business venture, and Tom goes undercover in search of information.

value.name: The Travel Agency
value.overview: While Cooper enlists Red on a case of personal importance, Ressler leads the Task Force on a mission to stop the resurgence of once-dormant murder-for-hire ring. Determined to find answers, Tom disregards a warning to halt his investigation into the suitcase.

value.name: The Kilgannon Corporation
value.overview: Red and the Task Force place Dembe undercover to infiltrate an international human smuggling organization, but when communication is lost, they must intervene. Meanwhile, Tom's investigation into the suitcase lands him in grave danger.

value.name: Ian Garvey
value.overview: Tom goes missing and Liz desperately retraces his steps to find him; Red's hunt for the suitcase of bones leads to lives being changed forever.

value.name: Ruin
value.overview: Liz abandons her old life and seeks out a fresh start in a place where no one knows her history, her name, or the depths of her grief. When an unexpected threat finds her, she is forced to draw on her emotional and physical strength in a brutal fight for survival.

value.name: The Informant
value.overview: When Red directs the Task Force to find a Blacklister who uses his position of power to sell sensitive information, Ressler finds himself at risk of exposure. Meanwhile, Liz plans her next move.

value.name: Abraham Stern
value.overview: When Red goes on the hunt for a legendary treasure, he draws the attention of Abraham Stern, a cunning manipulator who has devoted his life - and the lives of many innocents - to recovering the fortune that is his birthright. Meanwhile, Liz's  quest sends her down a dark path, leading her to study the methods of one of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminals.

value.name: The Cook
value.overview: As Liz works with Red to hunt for Tom's killers, she begins to question his motives. The Task Force enlists the help of one arsonist to catch another.

value.name: The Invisible Hand
value.overview: When bodies are discovered in abandoned woods, Red points the Task Force toward The Invisible Hand, a group that targets those whose actions are morally reprehensible yet fully legal. Meanwhile, Red steps in to assist one of his employees, and Liz discovers a major clue about Tom's investigation.

value.name: Mr. Raleigh Sinclair III
value.overview: Red assists the Task Force in tracking a mysterious Blacklister who carefully develops airtight alibis for murderous clients. Meanwhile, Liz's reinstatement at the FBI hinges on an evaluation with a psychotherapist.

value.name: Pattie Sue Edwards
value.overview: As Liz continues tracking Tom's killers, Red tries to solve a tax issue in his money laundering. Meanwhile, Aram goes out to the field when the Task Force investigates a viral outbreak.

value.name: The Capricorn Killer
value.overview: As Liz investigates new details in a cold case from her early work as an FBI profiler, she explores her darker impulses in therapy with Dr. Fulton. The Task Force takes action to bring down Tom's killers within the legal system, while Red takes a different approach to closing in on Ian Garvey.

value.name: Anna-Gracia Duerte
value.overview: When an associate of the Nash Syndicate is murdered, Red sets Liz and the Task Force on the case in order to recover evidence crucial to bringing down Ian Garvey. Meanwhile, Aram considers a step forward in his relationship with Samar.

value.name: Zarak Mosadek
value.overview: In an attempt to apply pressure to Ian Garvey, Red and the Task Force head to Paris to track down a prominent heroin supplier for the Nash Syndicate. Distrustful of Red's agenda, Liz takes her own path in going after Garvey.

value.name: Ian Garvey: Conclusion
value.overview: Liz uses intel from an unexpected source to force Red to uncover the secrets he holds; Red initiates a plan to retrieve the duffel bag of bones.

value.name: Nicholas T. Moore
value.overview: An unidentified young girl reappears and the team tries to find her connection to the secret Red is hiding.  When her family steps in to protect their own secrets, the investigation turns into a race to save the girl's life.

value.name: Lawrence Dane Devlin
value.overview: Samar lands in the crosshairs of an unconventional Blacklister, and Aram and the task force spring into action to find her before it's too late.  Red journeys to Costa Rica to prevent the duffel bag of bones from being sold at an underground auction.

value.name: Sutton Ross
value.overview: Liz and Red face off in a climactic race to find a Blacklister in possession of the duffel bag of bones, forcing the truth about the bones to finally come to light.

value.name: Season 6
value.overview: Following the startling revelation that Raymond "Red" Reddington isn't who he says he is, Elizabeth Keen is torn between the relationship she's developed with the man assumed to be her father and her desire to get to the bottom of years of secrets and lies. Meanwhile, Red leads Liz and the FBI to some of the most strange and dangerous criminals yet, growing his empire and eliminating rivals in the process. All throughout, Liz and Red engage in an uneasy cat-and-mouse game in which lines will be crossed and the truth will be revealed.

value.name: Dr. Hans Koehler
value.overview: Red presents the Task Force with a Blacklist case searching for a plastic surgeon who creates new identities for wanted criminals. Liz and her sister, Jennifer, secretly investigate the events that took place the night the real Raymond Reddington died.

value.name: The Corsican
value.overview: As Liz and the Task Force race to stop an imminent bombing by an elusive Blacklister, Red has an encounter that will change the trajectory of his life forever.

value.name: The Pharmacist
value.overview: While Liz and the Task Force track a notorious underground biohacker, Red initiates a strategy to extricate himself from a problematic position. Meanwhile, Cooper's integrity is tested with a difficult choice.

value.name: The Pawnbrokers
value.overview: Red acclimates to his new surroundings in federal prison, where he is challenged by an old rival. Samar goes undercover to stop a black market organization that fronts cash to criminals. Meanwhile, Liz and Jennifer continue their investigation into Red's past.

value.name: Alter Ego
value.overview: While Red argues in court to uphold the validity of his immunity agreement, Liz and the Task Force question a man whose recent inheritance seems too good to be true and Dembe offers Red some advice.

value.name: The Ethicist
value.overview: When Red is sent to a federal medical institution following his request to the court for a psychiatric evaluation, Liz and Jennifer use his time away to search for a Blacklister they believe may have valuable information about Red's past.

value.name: General Shiro
value.overview: While Red and Dembe enlist Glen's help in stacking the jury to Red's advantage for his upcoming trial, the task force investigates a series of mysterious deaths resulting from weaponized insects.

value.name: Marko Jankowics
value.overview: Liz and Jennifer's pursuit of a lead on the truth about Reddington puts them in unexpected danger. Red steps in to help mediate a brewing prison gang war.

value.name: Minister D
value.overview: As his trial begins, Red puts Liz and the task force on the case of a Blacklister who uses incriminating evidence to extort people -- and who Red believes can prove his innocence.

value.name: The Cryptobanker
value.overview: The Task Force delves into the unregulated world of cryptocurrency in order to stop an impending attack, while Red undertakes a risky endeavor in order to secure his freedom.

value.name: Bastien Moreau (1)
value.overview: Liz and the task force make a play to uncover the truth about an international assassination in a last-ditch effort to save Red's life.

value.name: Bastien Moreau: Conclusion (2)
value.overview: Cooper puts his reputation on the line to appeal to the White House on Red's behalf, as Liz and the task force resume their search for The Corsican, a Blacklister with ties to an international conspiracy. Samar's abilities in the field are tested.

value.name: Robert Vesco
value.overview: Red and the task force hunt for legendary fugitive Robert Vesco, one of history's most notorious con men. Samar makes a life-changing decision.

value.name: The Osterman Umbrella Company
value.overview: Red directs Liz to investigate a secret organization of assassins hired by global intelligence agencies to eliminate former agents, a case with ramifications that will change the task force forever.

value.name: Olivia Olson
value.overview: The Task Force searches for a woman who specializes in hostile takeovers of criminal organizations, and may have intelligence connected to an international conspiracy involving presidential advisor Anna McMahon. Meanwhile, Aram enacts a daring plan to gain leverage over Red.

value.name: Lady Luck
value.overview: Liz and Ressler investigate a Blacklister who offers to erase gambling debts -- at a deceptively high price. Dembe grows concerned as Red tests loyalties of their business associates in search of the individual who turned him in to the police.

value.name: The Third Estate
value.overview: Red and the task force spring into action to stop an anti-capitalist terrorist group from kidnapping and torturing the children of the one percent. Ressler goes behind Liz's back to find out what happened to her mother, Katarina Rostova.

value.name: The Brockton College Killer
value.overview: The task force is drawn into the investigation of an old case that has gained notoriety due to a popular true crime podcast. Red visits Dom Wilkinson for help making a difficult decision. Ressler makes a discovery about Katarina Rostova's past.

value.name: Rassvet
value.overview: Alone in a foreign country after a mission goes catastrophically wrong, Katarina Rostova goes on the run to avoid the forces trying to hunt her down.

value.name: Guillermo Rizal
value.overview: When multiple children are abducted under similar circumstances, the Task Force rushes to find the kidnapper. Meanwhile, Red goes on the hunt for a man who can find anything, while Liz considers a big change.

value.name: Anna McMahon
value.overview: Presidential adviser Anna McMahon faces off with Cooper and the task force in a winner-takes-all race to locate the missing dossier containing details of a conspiracy against America.

value.name: Robert Diaz
value.overview: As the president's true plan comes into focus, Liz and the task force fight to avert disaster. Red meets in secret with a man who holds information about his past.

value.name: Season 7
value.overview: After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond "Red" Reddington finds himself alone in hostile territory, unsure of who, if anyone, he can trust. Surrounded by old enemies and new allies, Red must stay one step ahead of the Blacklist's most dangerous criminal, who will stop at nothing to unearth the very truth Red wants no one to know about. To find it, Katarina will insinuate herself into the life of Elizabeth Keen, who has finally reunited with her daughter Agnes. Katarina’s presence will bring danger to Liz’s doorstep and forever alter her relationship with Red.

value.name: Louis T. Steinhil (1)
value.overview: After being abducted by Katarina Rostova, Raymond "Red" Reddington finds himself alone in hostile territory unsure of who, if anyone, he can trust. With few leads to go on, Liz and the Task Force venture into unknown danger as they race to find him.

value.name: Louis T. Steinhil: Conclusion (2)
value.overview: Liz, Dembe and the Task Force continue to search for Red. Red attempts to escape his abductors with help from a surprise ally, but discovers he is not Katarina Rostova's only target in her hunt for information.

value.name: Les Fleurs Du Mal
value.overview: Aram goes undercover to infiltrate a secret society of wealthy thrill-seekers, whose entertainment hinges upon spectacular acts of violence. Meanwhile, Red tries to negotiate with a former associate involved in the Townsend Directive, while Katarina Rostova takes steps to insinuate herself into Liz's life.

value.name: Kuwait
value.overview: Cooper's moral compass is tested when an officer whom he served with as young man, long presumed to be dead, resurfaces as a POW.

value.name: Norman Devane
value.overview: Liz and the Task Force investigate an infamous assassin who has a long history of weaponizing diseases, but has now turned to even more insidious activities. Meanwhile, Red and Dembe travel to Cuba in search of a lead, and Aram considers a new relationship. Elizabeth Bogush guest stars.

value.name: Dr. Lewis Powell
value.overview: Red alerts the FBI to the suspicious death of a scientist specializing in artificial intelligence research. Meanwhile, Francesca Campbell further entangles herself in Red's criminal activities

value.name: Hannah Hayes
value.overview: The Task Force investigates the unexplained disappearance and sudden re-emergence of a governor. Meanwhile, Red and Dembe surveil someone close to Katarina Rostova, as she inadvertently involves Agnes in an operation of her own.

value.name: The Hawaladar
value.overview: Desperate for information about the whereabouts of a longtime friend, Red directs the Task Force to find a blacklister who specializes in untraceable money transfers. Meanwhile, Liz receives some disturbing news from her daughter Agnes.

value.name: Orion Relocation Services
value.overview: Red and Liz investigate Orion Relocation Services, an organization that surreptitiously facilitates the disappearance and relocation of criminals. Meanwhile, Katarina delves into the memories of an old friend in order to get additional information about the Townsend Directive.

value.name: Katarina Rostova
value.overview: Red and the Task Force pay a visit to a former blacklister, as an explosive confrontation leads Liz to make a critical choice

value.name: Victoria Fenberg
value.overview: With the help of the Task Force, Red tracks a gifted art forger who has thwarted his plans to sell stolen pieces. Aram’s love life becomes increasingly complicated. Liz and Ressler confide in each other.

value.name: Cornelius Ruck
value.overview: Secluded on a private island, Red reunites with an old flame and a ring of thieves in a plot to make millions off stolen art. Plans are quickly derailed, however, when guests on the island mysteriously show up dead.

value.name: Newton Purcell
value.overview: The Task Force investigates a series of attacks on data centers perpetrated by a blacklister with a peculiar condition, as Liz conducts a secret investigation on the side. Meanwhile, Glen desperately tries to prove his value to Red after a shipping mishap.

value.name: Twamie Ullulaq
value.overview: A Blacklist case becomes personal for Agent Park when the team investigates a mysterious disappearance in the Alaska Triangle. Meanwhile, Aram enlists Red’s help to find out what really happened to Elodie’s husband.

value.name: Gordon Kemp
value.overview: A blacklist case forces Liz to choose sides between Red and the Task Force. Meanwhile, Red tries to calm a panicked Ilya Koslov, who believes he is under surveillance.

value.name: Nyle Hatcher
value.overview: Liz and the Task Force take on a cold case that may have some new victims. Meanwhile, Red tries to help a friend of Dembe who is in danger.

value.name: Brothers
value.overview: Ressler is forced to confront past trauma and family secrets when his brother takes him back home for a risky job.

value.name: Roy Cain
value.overview: As the Task Force investigates a kidnapping executed by seemingly impossible abductors, Dembe lands in a perilous situation. Meanwhile, a recent health scare causes Red to think about a successor.

value.name: The Kazanjian Brothers
value.overview: The Task Force investigates an accountant who works for lucrative criminals in order to find the violent and thuggish brothers hired for his protection. Meanwhile, Liz must make a momentous decision.

value.name: Season 8
value.overview: With his back against the wall, Raymond Reddington faces his most formidable enemy yet: Elizabeth Keen. Aligned with her mother, infamous Russian spy Katarina Rostova, Liz must decide how far she is willing to go to find out why Reddington has entered her life and what his endgame really is. The fallout between Reddington and Keen will have devastating consequences for all that lie in their wake, including the Task Force they helped to create.

value.name: Roanoke
value.overview: Red directs the task force to investigate Roanoke, a legendary criminal who orchestrates elaborate extractions. Meanwhile, Liz works to hatch a secret plan with her mother, Katarina Rostova.

value.name: Katarina Rostova: Conclusion
value.overview: As Liz pushes a source for answers, Red and the task force grapple with the implications of her actions. Tensions boil over and a drastic action is taken, which will change Red and Liz's relationship forever.

value.name: 16 Ounces
value.overview: Fueled by his betrayal, Elizabeth Keen seeks vengeance on Reddington.

value.name: Elizabeth Keen
value.overview: As Red and the task force search for Liz, she sets a new plan in motion that has catastrophic consequences.

value.name: The Fribourg Confidence
value.overview: The task force investigates an organization of bank robbers with a special expertise in stealing from other criminals. An old blacklist case resurfaces.

value.name: The Wellstone Agency
value.overview: Red and Dembe go to great lengths to fulfill the final wishes of a dear friend. Aram goes undercover as an interpreter to a company that provides services to criminals, while Park helps a friend in trouble.

value.name: Chemical Mary
value.overview: The task force must race to stop simultaneous danger presented by two blacklisters. Cooper approaches a congressman for intel.

value.name: Ogden Greeley
value.overview: The task force investigates the apparent disappearance of a defense contractor. Cooper receives an unexpected offer and Red makes a connection.

value.name: The Cyranoid
value.overview: The task force is thrown for a loop when they encounter a nefarious enterprise that provides doppelgängers for criminals. Red scrambles to counteract a bold move by Liz.

value.name: Dr. Laken Perillos
value.overview: Red and Dembe land in peril when Townsend deploys a torture specialist who uses unorthodox methods to interrogate her victims.

value.name: Captain Kidd
value.overview: The task force attempts to stop an abduction by searching for a "treasure man" who uses geocaching to hide illicit goods and facilitate transactions between otherwise warring criminal factions.

value.name: Rakitin
value.overview: The task force's determination to identify a Russian asset in the U.S. government puts Cooper and Reddington in increasingly treacherous positions.

value.name: Anne
value.overview: Red enjoys a quiet visit with a friend at her home in rural America.

value.name: Misère
value.overview: In a retrospective look at key turning points, steps are retraced that lead Elizabeth Keen to align with a powerful enemy.

value.name: The Russian Knot
value.overview: The Task Force hatches a plan to steal a Soviet-era cipher machine needed to decrypt coded messages. Townsend puts Liz's loyalty to the test. Red and Dembe are called to an unexpected meeting.

value.name: Nicholas Obenrader
value.overview: Liz and the Task Force track new leads in their investigation of N-13, while Red takes steps to infiltrate Townsend's criminal organization.

value.name: Ivan Stepanov
value.overview: Red tries desperately to rescue an old friend at all costs, while Liz and Townsend conduct an interrogation.

value.name: The Protean
value.overview: The Task Force springs into action to stop an elusive assassin on Liz's trail.

value.name: Balthazar "Bino" Baker
value.overview: Hoping to move some precious cargo quietly, Red enlists the assistance of an enforcer who specializes in transporting items through an underground network.

value.name: Godwin Page
value.overview: Liz, Red and Dembe are forced to work together to survive an attack from Townsend. Cooper and the Task Force attempt to de-escalate the increasing danger to all.

value.name: Nachalo
value.overview: When Reddington takes Liz to the mysterious epicenter of his empire, their shared past reveals itself and long buried secrets are divulged.

value.name: Konets
value.overview: Reddington makes a disturbing request to Liz in exchange for the truth about his identity.

value.name: Season 9
value.overview: In the two years following the death of Elizabeth Keen, Raymond Reddington and the members of the FBI Task Force have disbanded – their lives now changed in unexpected ways and with Reddington’s whereabouts unknown. Finding themselves each at a crossroads, a common purpose compels them to renew their original mission: to take down dangerous, vicious and eccentric Blacklisters. In the process, they begin to uncover lethal adversaries, unimaginable conspiracies and surprising betrayals that will threaten alliances and spur vengeance for the past, led by the most devious criminal of them all – Raymond Reddington.

value.name: The Skinner
value.overview: In the two years following the death of Elizabeth Keen, Raymond Reddington and the members of the FBI Task Force have disbanded with Reddington's whereabouts unknown. When one of their own is injured in the line of duty, however, the Task Force is drawn back together to bring down a conspiracy that could shatter global security.

value.name: The Skinner: Conclusion
value.overview: A kidnapping poses a test for the capabilities of the Task Force as they contend with a mysterious pirating organization.

value.name: The SPK
value.overview: A new case involving stolen artifacts reunites Red with a former blacklister. Aram faces a difficult decision.

value.name: The Avenging Angel
value.overview: The Task Force races to locate a blacklister who uses any means necessary to return what has been unjustly stolen. Ressler asks Park for a favor. Cooper tries to piece together an event for which he has no memory.

value.name: Benjamin T. Okara
value.overview: Dembe's position as an FBI agent causes complications for Red as the Task Force handles a case involving military technology. Cooper and Park each find their personal lives increasingly complicated.

value.name: Dr. Roberta Sand, Ph.D.
value.overview: The Task Force investigates a therapist who may be the key to the resurgence of an organized crime family. Red conducts an investigation of his own.

value.name: The Chosen One
value.overview: Preview of the upcoming season.

value.name: A Look Ahead
value.overview: Showrunners Jon Bokenkamp and John Eisendrath along with Co-Executive Producer Lukas Reiter give us a few tantalizing hints of what's to come for Red, Liz and the task force in Season 2.

value.name: Behind the Blacklist: Season 2
value.overview: Hosted by Amir Arison, “Behind The Blacklist: Season II” is a fun peek behind the curtain of this international television hit, presented through entertaining interviews with cast and creators sharing their “insider” stories, and exciting clip packages that feature everything fans love about THE BLACKLIST -- incredible action, colorful villains, evolving characters, unpredictable storylines, and edge-of-your-seat suspense. The special will conclude with the world-premiere of an eye popping :90 trailer, which will exclusively utilize new footage.

value.name: Season 5: First Look (Sneak Peek)
value.overview: James Spader, Megan Boone, Harry Lennix and Ryan Eggold share a preview of what's coming up on Season 5 of The Blacklist, premiering Wednesday, September 27 at 8/7c on NBC.

value.name: Comic-Con@Home 2020: The Blacklist
value.overview: Executive producers and cast, along with animators from Proof, Inc., discuss how producing a partially animated episode—amid the challenges of working remotely—allowed them to complete Season 7 after production was shut down due to COVID-19.

value.name: Like Father Like Daughter
value.overview: An overview and look at the similarities between Raymond "Red" Reddington and Elizabeth Keen AKA Masha Rostova.

value.name: A darker Shade of Red
value.overview: A look into the dark side of Raymond "Red" Reddington.

value.name: Mr Kaplan: End of an era
value.overview: A look at the end of Mr Kaplan.
